entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning except low minus 19 in a few localities. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning except low minus 19 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
